abstract.text: A class that represents person, group, or room invited to a calendar event.

inlineContent.text: objects directly. Instead, use the property attendees on
EventKit cannot add participants to an event nor change participant information. Use the properties in this class to get information about a participant.
A participant can be a person, group, room, or other resource.

abstract.text: Create, view, and edit calendar and reminder events.
